name: part_001
file: tmp_【 重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ2周年LIVE 『ANIMAL』【3D LIVE】 [oU85vmx7jn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui continues her performance of the song 'Overbird'.
Takane Lui performs the song 'Parasite' by DECO*27.

subtitles.original: 師走はやめて まとめ役なら
subtitles.english: Stop it with December. If you're the coordinator...

subtitles.original: 聞くを上手に おなじみ合ってる
subtitles.english: ...you're good at listening, as we're used to each other.

subtitles.original: 仲良しこよしだ
subtitles.english: We're the best of friends.

subtitles.original: さあ だっ だっ だっ だ 黙れ 黙れよ
subtitles.english: Now, da-da-da-da, shut up, shut up.

subtitles.original: 言えないね そんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: I can't say such strong words.

subtitles.original: 少しだけ 静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I just want you to be a little quiet.

subtitles.original: ああ 私達 待望へ
subtitles.english: Ah, we are heading for the long-awaited.

subtitles.original: 世界てんてんてんぱく Yeah Yeah Yeah 果たすその日まで
subtitles.english: The world is turning white, Yeah Yeah Yeah, until the day it's fulfilled.

subtitles.original: れれれ 煉獄 Yeah Yeah Yeah あなたの周りも Yeah Yeah
subtitles.english: Re-re-re Purgatory, Yeah Yeah Yeah, around you too, Yeah Yeah.

subtitles.original: 境界線 線 全て あれあれあれや 約束の地まで
subtitles.english: Boundary lines, all that, oh, oh, oh, until the promised land.

subtitles.original: さあ掲げよ バッテン バッテン てんてんてんぱく Yeah Yeah Yeah
subtitles.english: Now hold up the cross, cross, turning white, Yeah Yeah Yeah.

subtitles.original: 今日も来ない そっちのけだね 家に成るから
subtitles.english: You're not coming today either, neglecting me, because I'm becoming home.

subtitles.original: 私一人でも やっておきますね
subtitles.english: Even if I'm alone, I'll get it done.

subtitles.original: すべて すべて すべて 任せて それをさせてよ
subtitles.english: Leave everything, everything, everything to me, let me do that.

subtitles.original: 大事なことなの わかっているでしょう
subtitles.english: It's an important thing, you know that, right?

subtitles.original: 四六時中 帰りの階段 めんどくさいまま
subtitles.english: All day long, the stairs back home, feeling troublesome.

subtitles.original: 今日も明日も 過ぎていくのでしょう
subtitles.english: Today and tomorrow will probably pass by.

subtitles.original: 花瓶に水をあげましょう
subtitles.english: Let's water the vase.

subtitles.original: 刻の中 萎れたこと 忘れてた
subtitles.english: In time, I forgot that things had withered.

subtitles.original: さあ だっ だっ だっ だ 黙れ 黙れよ
subtitles.english: Now, da-da-da-da, shut up, shut up.

subtitles.original: 言えないね そんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: I can't say such strong words.

subtitles.original: 少しだけ 静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I just want you to be a little quiet.

subtitles.original: ああ 私達 待望へ
subtitles.english: Ah, we are heading for the long-awaited.

subtitles.original: 夢と未来 見たかったはずなのに
subtitles.english: I should have wanted to see dreams and the future.

subtitles.original: 世界てんてんてんぱく Yeah Yeah Yeah 見えずその日まで
subtitles.english: The world is turning white, Yeah Yeah Yeah, until that day when it's unseen.

subtitles.original: だっ だっ だっ だっ 永遠 この世の理 Yeah Yeah Yeah
subtitles.english: Da, da, da, da, eternity, the truth of this world, Yeah Yeah Yeah.

subtitles.original: 今はてんてんてん さあ さあ さあ あなたの待ち中
subtitles.english: Now it's... come on, come on, come on, while waiting for you.

subtitles.original: 片手で作るはバッテン さあ世界てんてんてんぱく Yeah Yeah Yeah
subtitles.english: Making a cross with one hand, now the world is turning white, Yeah Yeah Yeah.

subtitles.original: 果たすその日まで れれれ 煉獄 Yeah Yeah Yeah
subtitles.english: Until the day it's fulfilled, re-re-re Purgatory, Yeah Yeah Yeah.

subtitles.original: あなたの周りも Yeah Yeah 境界線 線 全て あれあれあれや
subtitles.english: Around you too, Yeah Yeah, boundary lines, all that, oh, oh, oh.

subtitles.original: 約束の地まで さあ掲げよ バッテン バッテン
subtitles.english: Until the promised land, now hold up the cross, cross.

subtitles.original: てんてんてん しんたらびてんじのワインをあけましょう
subtitles.english: Turning... let's open the wine of the heavens.

subtitles.original: ねえ あたしのことが好きなら
subtitles.english: Hey, if you love me...

subtitles.original: 気付いて 気付いて 気付いて 気付いて
subtitles.english: Notice me, notice me, notice me, notice me.

subtitles.original: 夢を見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show me a dream.

subtitles.original: どうしてわかってくれないの？
subtitles.english: Why don't you understand?

subtitles.original: 嫌いだ 嫌いだ 嫌いだ 嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, I hate you.

subtitles.original: 二度と触れないで
subtitles.english: Never touch me again.

subtitles.original: バラサイト
subtitles.english: Parasite

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：DECO*27
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: DECO*27

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って どこからおかしくなったの？
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, where did it go wrong?

subtitles.original: ダメなとこも好きになれて よかったのに
subtitles.english: It was fine that I could even love your bad parts.

subtitles.original: パッと呑んで誰かに埋めてもらえたら
subtitles.english: If I could just drink it up and have someone fill the void...

subtitles.original: あなたのこと忘れられると 思っていた
subtitles.english: I thought I could forget about you.

subtitles.original: トモダチってさ 都合よくないけど
subtitles.english: Being "friends" isn't exactly convenient,

subtitles.original: 繋がってるなら 悪くはないね
subtitles.english: But if we're connected, it's not so bad.

subtitles.original: 騙し騙し生きて病んじゃって
subtitles.english: Living by deceiving ourselves and getting sick,

subtitles.original: 優しくされると余計にツライ
subtitles.english: Being treated kindly makes it even more painful.

subtitles.original: けど冷たくされるの望んでないの
subtitles.english: But I don't want to be treated coldly.

subtitles.original: あたしだけでいいよって信じちゃって バカだ
subtitles.english: Believing that "just me is enough"... I'm an idiot.

subtitles.original: ねえ あたしのことが好きなら
subtitles.english: Hey, if you love me...

subtitles.original: 気付いて 気付いて 気付いて 気付いて
subtitles.english: Notice me, notice me, notice me, notice me.

subtitles.original: 夢を見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show me a dream.

subtitles.original: どうしてわかってくれないの？
subtitles.english: Why don't you understand?

subtitles.original: 嫌いだ 嫌いだ 嫌いだ 嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, I hate you.

subtitles.original: 二度と触れないで
subtitles.english: Never touch me again.

subtitles.original: 小さい感情は 1・2・の…で流れ星
subtitles.english: Tiny emotions, 1, 2... and they're shooting stars.

subtitles.original: あの子のこと 呪ってあげるわ
subtitles.english: I'll put a curse on that girl for you.

subtitles.original: ねえ 愛した時間を返してよ
subtitles.english: Hey, give me back the time I spent loving you.

subtitles.original: 嘘つき 嘘つき 嘘つき 嘘つき
subtitles.english: Liar, liar, liar, liar.

subtitles.original: でもまだ好きだよ
subtitles.english: But I still love you.

subtitles.original: 吸って吐いて そう ちゃんと生きて
subtitles.english: Inhale, exhale, yeah, live properly.

subtitles.original: 鼓膜舐める愛のCoda
subtitles.english: The coda of love that licks my eardrums.

subtitles.original: 溶かし尽くす煙るSoda
subtitles.english: A smoky soda that melts everything away.

subtitles.original: ねえ 置いていかないで
subtitles.english: Hey, don't leave me behind.
